## PasswordEnroll.enroll() method

Changes a password.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
enroll(newPassword: string, oldPassword: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newPassword | <code>string</code> | a new password. |
|  oldPassword | <code>string</code> | a password to replace. Must match the existing password. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

a promise to perform the password change or reject in case of an error.
